task_summary: Navigate the manipulator around an obstacle to reach the blue pen.

task_long_description.overview: A manipulator robot situated on a desk must move past a set of books (obstacle) to reach the blue pen placed upright in a holder. The robot perceives the pen, approaches while avoiding collision with the books, aligns its end-effector above and near the pen, and moves precisely to the pen's position. All actions are based on visual input with verification steps.
preconditions: Robot is powered on and ready.
Workspace contains books (obstacle) and a blue pen in a holder.
No objects obstruct the manipulator's origin path.
stepwise_plan: Check if blue pen is visible; perform scan if not.
Detect and localize the blue pen.
Move the arm above the blue pen at a safe height.
Align the arm for approach to avoid obstacles.
Move laterally (y-axis) to clear the books.
Move directly to the blue pen.
Verify arrival at the blue pen location.
success_criteria: Robot end-effector reaches the blue pen without colliding with obstacles.
Robot is positioned at the designated blue pen location.
failure_and_recovery: Failure to detect blue pen: re-scan up to 3 times.
Obstacle collision detected: abort and retreat if sensors provide feedback.
Timeout reached while moving: consider re-planning.
task_long_description.termination: Task completes successfully when the robot is at the blue pen; aborts on unrecoverable perception or collision errors.

frame_3.now_evidence: first stable contact and alignment cue visible
frame_3.predicts_next: push actuation expected; confirms goal direction

task_instruction: avoid obstacle and reach the blue pen

node_specs.description: Checks if the blue pen is visible to the perception system.
Scans workspace with a raster pattern to locate the blue pen, up to 3 attempts.
Attempts to detect and localize the blue pen.
Moves above the blue pen at 10cm offset to clear obstacles.
Approaches and aligns the robot with the blue pen, within tight tolerance.
Moves laterally (y-axis) by 10cm to bypass obstacle (books).
Moves end-effector directly to the blue pen position.
Checks if the robot is currently at the blue pen.

failure_modes: Blue pen not visible after all scans
recovery_strategy: Retry scanning for blue pen up to 3 times.
Abort and retreat if collision detected or timed out.
Report error if blue pen unreachable.
assumptions: Instruction did not specify avoidance method; MoveDelta is used to sidestep books obstacle, as visible in frames.
No grasping/placing needed; only navigation planned.
If true obstacle feedback or sensor collision available, would insert safety or ContactDetected node; not specified.

expected_success_criteria: Robot moves around books and precisely reaches the blue pen location without collisions.
